review:
It’s all been said in the other five star reviews.  Dr. P.Shiv Raj is an awesome Doctor, our entire family is very thankful to him, I am surviving just because of him,he saved my life, I have a rare disease i.e MCTD, many doctors were failed to diagnosis the disease but Dr Shiv Raj has found out. I am now leading a normal life, and following his prescription 
He is a best doctor i have ever met. 

Doctor's are consider to be God and now i have no doubt on this saying.
I wish him all the best and I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consultanted Dr Sivaraj last year ,as I was suffering with severe wheezing problem during my pregnancy.His treatment really worked for me and it dint affect my baby's growth in anyway.I used cough really heavy which was very painful as I was pregnant too..I get sharp pains in stomach  and I couldn't sleep at nights Treatment he gave helped me recover really fast and gave me great relief.I am really thankful to Dr sivraj.I am trying to consult him again for my wheezing problem.But he has left Global hospital.If anyone have his contact no or any details like where he is consulting old let me know

I went for my moms consultation and we are from vellore. 

Well organized treatment regime. Spends adequate time to review reports and speaks with a positive energy with the patient. His patience in listening to patients complaints is very much welcoming. Totally satisfied.

Strictly not recommended. Its very horible  we waited for 3 hours, and informed sister that mam pls send us inside we took 2 hours permission and came. Nurse laughed at us and replied, Sir if u r comming to meet Shivraj, you should take leave and come. This is what happening. doctor doesnt be in his cabin. everytime he will go out come after 30mins and more even. We even took apppintment and went but no use. we waited for 3 hours. i even checked with some of the patients, they said that they are waiting from morning. Its very Embarrassing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had to wait for almost 1.5 hours for the doc to check.I already had a report (blood tests) with me but he still insisted on getting a more detailed Thyroid test from 3 specific diagnostic centers.I requested him of I can use another diagnostic center as I may get some discount from there,he instantly became rude and said he wants the test only from the 3 diagnostic centers otherwise he will no go ahead. **** ***** **** ** **** ***** ** *** *** ********** ******* **** *** * **************** ****** *********** ** *** ** ********* **** *** ********** ************** *** *** *********** *** *** ***** **** ****** ***** **** **** ********** **** *** ****** *** ******** ** ****** ** ***I will not return to this doctor again

I had booked the appointment and got the confirmation from practo as well as hospital. However, the doctor has  left without giving any prior information. After reaching the hospital, the information was provided. Quite unprofessional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good at explaining about the problem and gave the solution which is very satisfactory. More over kind enough to listen to our problem and address the issue which gives me immense pleasure. Very happy with Dr Shivaraj.
Doctor was not reachable after confirmed appointment for more than hour after which met with another doctor for consultation and was not completely satisfied.

My parents got treatment from him. Nice person and guided us properly.
Worth to get treatment from him.

I consulted Dr Sivaraj since a few months. His methodical treatment and highly positive approach gave great strength and high hopes of quick recovery.Due to his correct and high clinical knowledge I gained and recovered dramatically within the shortest time. I would like to remain under his care and treatment even in future. He is a great asset to not only to the hospital but to the whole array of patients. I wish him great success in his career.
Vk veluchamy
Rd General manager
Power grid corporation of India ltd.
